title: LoL in 4K Resolution?
body: Alright Riot, explain to me whether you are or are not going to make League compatible with 4K. I'm getting sick of not being able to tab out or worrying about the cursor becoming too small. 4k isn't something new but it just seems like you guys like working on the things that aren't improving the experience of a lot of LoL players. But yee, please let me know, I wanna be able to enjoy League with this 4k UHD shit.

replies.body: I don't have any kind of ETA, but we are looking at bringing more compatibility for [**4K graphics**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/ask-riot-summoner-spells-4k-support-and-reddit) into the client. As we finish up projects, we should be able to start putting more effort into things like this!

Arrogant worm. Start paying Riot to advance this then, otherwise wait. It's not cheap developing for 4K. Damn textures are no where near 4K in the first place. 4K for league lmfao. You just want a bigger screen to have vision advantage.

Get out.

Uhm, you really have 0 idea what the issue is with 4k in league, do you? You get 0 (ZERO) vision advantage in 4k as the aspect ratio stays exactly the same, the problem is that the UI gets INCREDIBLY small and you can hardly play the game anymore. And league makes more money than any other game on the planet, and even ONE man indi devs can add 4k support.
